sentence.Network_en: His natural shrewdness tells him what is needed to succeed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他与生俱来的精明告诉他成功所需要的一切。

sentence.Network_en: Freed acted with his accustomed shrewdness.
sentence.Network_cn: 弗里德以他一贯的精明风范行动起来。

sentence.Network_en: He was more than my match in diplomatic shrewdness.
sentence.Network_cn: 论外交手腕之精明,我远不敌他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 城字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 城防〖 thedefenceofacity〗 城府〖 shrewdness;subtlety〗 城根〖 areadirectlyadjacenttocitywall〗.
求结尾是ness的单词~越多越好~~_百度知道 ... lewdness 淫荡, 邪恶 shrewdness 机敏, 机灵, 精明 fierceness 强烈,凶猛.
while away the time 消磨/打发时间shrewdness 机敏，敏锐，犀利far-fetched 牵强附会，不自然.
...red tape 官样文章，烦琐和拖拉的公务程序shrewdness 清明，机灵deadlock 僵局，僵持；使陷于僵局.

list.abs: yank 猛拉Yankee shrewdness 极刻薄Yankee 美国人
he is a shrewd and sometimes ruthless adversary ., 他是个精明的 , 有时候冷酷无情的对手.
He was a shrewd businessman . He knew which side his bread was buttered on ., 他是一个精明的商人 , 深知自己的利益所在.
Her brother is a shrewd businessman ., 她兄弟是个精明的生意人.
Mr Smith is a shrewd man , he is not be caught with chaff ., 史密斯先生是个精明的人 , 不会轻易上当.
Mr Adams is a shrewd man , he is not to be caught with chaff ., 亚当斯先生是个机灵人 , 不容易上当.

entry.tran: 精明的;敏锐的;有眼光的;精于盘算的
entry.def: A shrewd person is able to understand and judge a situation quickly and to use this understanding to their own advantage.

example.ex: His grey eyes were shrewd but kindly...
example.tran: 他灰色的眼睛目光锐利却很亲切。

means.word_mean: 1. intelligence manifested by being astute (as in business dealings)

auth_sentence.content: She's right and you cheered her mean shrewdness.

auth_sentence.content: Governor Granholm, whose Midwestern sweetness can sometimes mask her shrewdness, chaired the meeting.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Governor Granholm, whose Midwestern sweetness can sometimes mask her shrewdness, chaired the meeting.

auth_sentence.content: I was quite lost in admiration of the shrewdness our host displayed in the dispensing of the gifts.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was quite lost in admiration of the shrewdness our host displayed in the dispensing of the gifts.

Sentence.sentence: In our times, human shrewdness has mastered the deep mysteries of the earth at a level far beyond the capacities of earlier peoples.
